title: r/UCSC on Reddit: the chancellor is receiving a 28.5% pay increase.
snippet: u/Ok_Marionberry_8181 did you not read the document you linked to? On the third page there’s a chart with the newly proposed salaries, and three asterisks next to Cynthia Larive’s name.

title: UC chancellors get big raises, putting them between $785,000 and nearly $1.2 million
snippet: UC Santa Cruz Chancellor Cynthia Larive will voluntarily forgo her base salary increase for 2024-25.

title: UCSC Chancellor Cynthia Larive up for regular five-year review - Lookout Santa Cruz
snippet: UC Santa Cruz Chancellor Cynthia Larive is set to undergo an overdue five-year performance review, part of a standard UC systemwide process led by President James Milliken and faculty leaders.

title: Cynthia Larive | Transparent California
snippet: Cynthia Larive · We're starting to collect 2024 data. If you'd like to help us, you can donate or sponsor your favorite agency. Sponsor an agency ·

title: Non-Represented Staff Employee Equity Program 2022-23 - News
snippet: Chancellor Cynthia Larive and Campus Provost and Executive Vice Chancellor Lori Kletzer, UC Santa Cruz will invest $5.5 million over three years in a salary equity program for our non-represented staff.
